title: Career Counseling Sessions
subtitle: Confused about which career path to take? Let Dr. Emily Carter guide you with personalized advice, skill assessments, and a roadmap to your dream career.

title: Resume Review
subtitle: Struggling to stand out in the job market? Receive professional insights from Mr. John Smith to craft a job-winning resume.

title: Interview Preparation
subtitle: Nervous about your next interview? Join Ms. Sophia Johnson for mock interviews, behavioral tips, and strategies to ace your interview.

title: Public Speaking Workshop
subtitle: Afraid of talking in front of others? Overcome stage fright, master body language, and build confidence with Mr. David Lee.

title: College Application Guidance
subtitle: Applying for college? Get step-by-step support from Dr. Anna Brown, including essay writing, scholarship searches, and more.

title: Team Building Exercises
subtitle: Improve team dynamics with interactive activities, trust-building exercises, and leadership development led by Mr. Mark Thompson.

title: Stress Management Techniques
subtitle: Feeling overwhelmed? Learn mindfulness exercises, breathing techniques, and work-life balance strategies with Ms. Rachel Green.

title: Time Management Skills
subtitle: Struggling to balance tasks? Master daily planning, overcome procrastination, and audit your time effectively with Dr. Henry Taylor.

title: Confidence Booster Program
subtitle: Feeling stuck or hesitant? Build your confidence for interviews, public speaking, and teamwork with our expert-guided program.
